channel.title: Github on The Median Data Scientist
channel.description: Recent content in Github on The Median Data Scientist

item.title: Trying out GitHub Pages with Blogdown
item.description: Today I am trying to get a blogdown site to work with GitHub pages, but I cannot seem to get the posts to link correctly with relative links. Well, I hope to delete the pre-included widgets for now since I do not have publications.
